text:
@realDonaldTrump @narendramodi Hey, if you have a really good brain to make your economy healthy, please use it wisely ..! Do not use your evil brain for your political business, stop spreading #coronavirus. You will be damaged, but innocent people will be killed and are dying.

#CoronavirusPandemic
